Class SyntaxUtils

    Static methods to search for text elements

    • Method Detail

      • isWord

        public static boolean isWord(java.lang.String text,
                             java.lang.String word,
                             int pos)
        Returns if the specified word is a word.

        A word is considered as such if it does not adjoin to a letter or a digit at the left and/or right end.

        Parameters:
        text - the text which the word is part of
        word - the word that may be a word
        pos - the position where the word starts
        Returns:
        if the word does not adjoin to a letter or a digit

      • isWordStart

                                int pos)

      • isInBlock

        public static boolean isInBlock(java.lang.String text,
                                int pos,
                                java.lang.String blockStart,
                                java.lang.String blockEnd)
        Returns if the specified pos is found in a block of text that is delimited by given start and end signals
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position that may be found in a block of text
        blockStart - the String that defines the block start
        blockEnd - the String that defines the block end
        Returns:
        if the specified pos is found in a certain block of text

      • lastBlockStart

        public static int lastBlockStart(java.lang.String text,
                                 int pos,
                                 java.lang.String blockStart,
                                 java.lang.String blockEnd)
        Returns the position of the last block start where block is a portion of text that is bordered by a block start and a block end signal.
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position relative to which the last block start is searched
        blockStart - the String that signals the start of a block
        blockEnd - the String that signals the end of a block
        Returns:
        the position of the last block start before 'pos'. -1 if no block start is found or a block end is closer to 'pos' than a block start

      • nextBlockEnd

        public static int nextBlockEnd(java.lang.String text,
                               int pos,
                               java.lang.String blockStart,
                               java.lang.String blockEnd)
        Returns the position of the next block end where block is a portion of text that is bordered by a block start and a block end signal.
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position relative to which the next block end is searched
        blockStart - the String that signals the start of a block
        blockEnd - the String that signals the end of a block
        Returns:
        the position of the next block end after 'pos'. -1 if no end is found or the next block start is closer to 'pos' than the block end

      • isInQuotes

        public static boolean isInQuotes(java.lang.String text,
                                 int pos,
                                 java.lang.String str)
        Returns if a given string is in double quotes
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the start position of the portion that may be in quotes
        str - the string that may be in quotes
        Returns:
        if the specified string is in double quotes
